name: Frosmoth
description: A majestic ice moth whose crystalline wings create devastating blizzards. Its strategic prowess and powerful ice attacks make it a feared competitor in battles.

ability.name: Ice Scales
ability.description: Special attacks deal 50% less damage. Ice moves have 100% accuracy and 20% chance to freeze. Immune to burn.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.description: Fires an icy beam that may freeze the target.

moves.name: Bug Buzz
moves.description: Creates a damaging sound wave that may lower special defense.

moves.name: Quiver Dance
moves.description: Dances to raise special attack, special defense, and speed.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.description: Summons a fierce blizzard that may freeze all enemies.

habitat: Frozen tundras and icy mountain caves
